name: open-msupply
//: Main version for the app, should be in semantic version format (any release candidate or test build should be separated by '-' i.e. 1.1.1-rc1 or 1.1.1-test

scripts.start: cd ./server && cargo run & cd ./client && yarn start-local
scripts.build: cd ./client && yarn build && cd ../server && cargo build --release
scripts.test: cd ./server && ulimit -n 1000 && cargo test && cd ../client && yarn test
